languages.text: "Я могу навестить заскучавший скот и в одиночку. Пожалуй, сделаю это при первой же возможности".
"If the cattle are bored, I can visit them on my own. I will do so at the first opportunity."
languages.original_text: "Я могу навестить заскучавший скот и в одиночку. Пожалуй, сделаю это при первой же возможности".

traits.locale_text: "If the cattle are bored, I can visit them on my own. I will do so at the first opportunity."
"If the cattle are bored, I can visit them on my own. I will do so at the first opportunity."
"If the cattle are bored, I can visit them on my own. I will do so at the first opportunity."
"If the cattle are bored, I can visit them on my own. I will do so at the first opportunity."

languages.text: “如果那群牲口闲着没事，我很乐意亲自造访，当仁不让。”
languages.original_text: "If the cattle are bored, I can visit them on my own. I will do so at the first opportunity."

traits.locale_text: “如果那群牲口闲着没事，我很乐意亲自造访，当仁不让。”

languages.text: « Si le bétail s'ennuie, je peux toujours aller leur rendre visite moi-même. D'ailleurs, c'est ce que je ferai dès que j'en aurai l'occasion. »
languages.original_text: "If the cattle are bored, I can visit them on my own. I will do so at the first opportunity."

traits.locale_text: « Si le bétail s'ennuie, je peux toujours aller leur rendre visite moi-même. D'ailleurs, c'est ce que je ferai dès que j'en aurai l'occasion. »

languages.text: «Si el ganado se aburre, puedo visitarlo en solitario. Lo haré en cuanto tenga ocasión».
languages.original_text: "If the cattle are bored, I can visit them on my own. I will do so at the first opportunity."

traits.locale_text: «Si el ganado se aburre, puedo visitarlo en solitario. Lo haré en cuanto tenga ocasión».

languages.text: 「牛どもが退屈しているのなら、俺ひとりで会いに行くこともできる。機会があればそうするつもりだ」
languages.original_text: "If the cattle are bored, I can visit them on my own. I will do so at the first opportunity."

traits.locale_text: 「牛どもが退屈しているのなら、俺ひとりで会いに行くこともできる。機会があればそうするつもりだ」

languages.text: "Wenn dem Vieh langweilig ist, kann ich sie allein besuchen. Ich werde das bei erstbester Gelegenheit tun."
languages.original_text: "If the cattle are bored, I can visit them on my own. I will do so at the first opportunity."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn dem Vieh langweilig ist, kann ich sie allein besuchen. Ich werde das bei erstbester Gelegenheit tun."

languages.original_text: "If the cattle are bored, I can visit them on my own. I will do so at the first opportunity."

languages.text: "Canı sıkılan varsa eğlendiririz, sorun yok. Hatta ilk fırsatta uğrayacağım."
languages.original_text: "If the cattle are bored, I can visit them on my own. I will do so at the first opportunity."

traits.locale_text: "Canı sıkılan varsa eğlendiririz, sorun yok. Hatta ilk fırsatta uğrayacağım."
